title: Juan's Flying Burrito - The CBD
typeOfFood: Lacto, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Semi-fast food Mexican restaurant with few outlets; this one is short walk from Bourbon St. Cooks rice without chicken stock. Their refried beans are cooked in bacon grease, but black beans and pinto beans are vegan (reported Mar 2016). Kitchen cooks food to-order, so let your server know if you're veg/vegan.
